docs.title: Docker Commands Reference
docs.text: This page contains useful Docker commands with their descriptions.

docs.title: 🔹 Docker Basics
docs.text:
• docker --version Check the installed Docker version.

  • docker info Display system-wide information about Docker.

docs.title: 🔹 Working with Containers
docs.text:
• docker ps Show running containers.

  • docker ps -a Show all containers (running & stopped).

  • docker run -it ubuntu bash Run an Ubuntu container interactively.

docs.title: 🔹 Working with Images
docs.text:
• docker images List all Docker images on the system.

  • docker pull nginx Download the latest nginx image from Docker Hub.

  • docker rmi <image_id> Remove an image.

docs.title: 🔹 Networking
docs.text:
• docker network ls List all Docker networks.

  • docker network inspect bridge Inspect the default bridge network.

  • docker network create my_network Create a custom network.

More commands coming soon!
